name: HexLogic - Rainbows
description:
We scooped up rainbows of color wherever we found them, from paint pots to birds to colored pencils, and turned them into HexLogic – Rainbow puzzles to please your eye and twist your brain. HexLogic – Rainbows has 69 puzzles of various levels of difficulty, based on 23 pictures.

GabySoft, creators of the addicting FlipPix series of nonogram logic puzzles, has gathered their resources once again and presented you with a unique new way to exercise your mental muscles on your iPhone and iPad.

Players will enjoy using their deduction and reasoning skills to paint tiles and reveal a hidden picture.

As an added bonus, purchase this HexLogic puzzle app and download the full version of HexLogic - Zoo with 69 puzzles free!
